Buen juego, divertido si encuentras un grupo de gente para jugar puede ser mucho mas divertido.
Varios modos de juego, recomiendo comenzar con deathmatch o carrera de armamentos.
El anticheat esta cada vez peor, abundan los chiteros.

Counter Strike is a game that you always come back to. Its got so much history that you just cant help but fall in love with the nostalgia even if you didnt' play back in the 1.6 days. You can play casually in the competitive mode as the lower ranks aren't too serious, or you could play the custom games that creative people come up with in the community maps. Counter Strike will always be worth getting, but if you plan to play competitively you will want to buy the high priority matchmaking there are a lot of cheaters in low priority, not as many but some in high priority as well. This game also has an incredible economy behind it with all the skins you can get. 10/10
its a fun game to play with family and friends :)
